data.title: Pentair Aurora Pumps
data.meta_description: When it comes to moving liquid, Pentair Aurora Pumps likely has one perfect for your application.
data.text:
Aurora manufactures all its pumps to ISO 9001 quality standards for a lifetime of reliable, efficient use. The company builds every pump from premium materials such as ASTM A743 Type 316 Stainless Steel, A536 Ductile Iron, and A48 cast iron.

Attention to detail and innovative designs result in sturdy, quiet, smooth-running pumps with longer life cycles. Even the best products may experience a problem, so the company backs its products with outstanding customer service, a comprehensive OEM parts and accessories selection, and a distribution network of skilled companies like us, the Ryan Company.

Note: We list a sampling of the types of pumps Aurora builds below. However, we have access to many more and related accessories. Contact us if you don’t see what you are looking for, and we’ll get it for you and your project.

Aurora builds liquid pumps in these and many other categories:

End Suction Pumps

In-Line Pumps

Circulator Pumps

Jockey Pumps

Vertical Multi-Stage Pumps

Regenerative Turbine Pumps

Accessories Necessary for Top-Performance Builds and Maintenance

The Ryan Boiler Company has represented Pentair Aurora in the Upper Midwest since YYYY. Working closely with engineers and contractors since 1970, our dedicated team has designed and installed almost every commercial and industrial heating solution imaginable.

Once installed, our service staff have the training and in-the-field experience to keep your liquid moving systems doing what they’re designed to do for years to come.

Our dedication to quality and service matches that of Aurora, and together, we deliver efficient, reliable liquid moving solutions that meet and exceed your expectations — it’s just that simple.

When your project demands reliable, quiet, and efficient liquid-moving pumps with exceptional life cycles, we can help. Contact the Ryan Company at 952-915-6475 for the best Aurora pumping solutions anywhere in Minnesota, North Dakota, South Dakota, or Western Wisconsin. We’ll help you get into hot water, but in a good way!
